survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of fitness apps to understand their satisfaction, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a fitness app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use a fitness app?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your fitness app? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'
